dc_title_s: Plan and sections of Fort Fisher carried by assault by the U.S. Forces Maj. Gen. A.H. Terry commanding Jan. 15th 1865, headqurtrs U.S. Forces Fort Fisher, Jan. 27th 1865
dc_description_s: "E. Molitor, lith."  Relief shown by hachures and pictorially.  Oriented with north toward the upper right.|27 x 39 centimeters|Scale [1:3840]. 320 feet to 1 inch|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Engraved in the Engineer Bureau, War Dept. (Washington, D.C.?)
